ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech
ModMetaData.author: Xavior
ModMetaData.description:
GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos.
(Unofficial Version for 1.5 and below) *I am not the original author* Original Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725576127 Pulled and updated from: 725576127 mod folder Original Git Repo: https://github.com/sam23694/GlitterTech/tree/1.0.2059 Current Mod Repo: https://github.com/mdrain18/XaviorsGlitterTech.git
Updating Mod:
It can be said this mod is OP. I think it should be, however, in the spirit of being able to play how you want to I am adding a few changes to this mod.
Currently: Working on getting this CE compatible but I need help with testing to see what needs to be patched 1) Add some Anomaly specific items... ideas are welcome :) 2) Glitter tech incidents and quests - Archotech quest: three abandon glitter tech outposts which have consoles that need to be decrypted. Each gives you 1/3 of the location, collect all three and you will get the location of the archotech factory, which is hidden deep into a side of a mountain. Once there, there will be several boxes with archotech prosthetics, psylinks (if you have the DLC), Archite capsules (if you have the DLC), 3) Glitter Tech Weapons and Armor Expanded 4) Craft Glitter Tech Weapons and Armor Expanded: - I'm thinking of adding special items which can only be found via quests 5) More..... STUFF! Starting with Glitter swords and Glitter psycasts... I think. Not sure if I will ever get here but I'm being optimistic
Let me know in the "Changes" discussion what you want done with this mod and I will do my best to make it happen. Link below: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2558099206/3480742287613877229/
Release Notes: 1.6.4514 - Updated to 1.6 version of the game. - Incorporated the "No Surgery" mod as a checkbox into this one. Please let me know if there is any issues with this. - Added airtight tags to Titanium, Alpha and Beta Polys - Added support for new 1.6 tags like VacuumResistance and terrain affordance. - Introduced stopping power to bullets - Updated some graphics (more to come) - Batteries now have charging bar..again - Over arching game play balance and bug fixes - Description changes to match game play - Key bugs fixed: - Heavy duty power conduct does click and drag placement - Turrets now point in the right direction - Nano tech gear layers have been corrected - Plasma Fusion Reactor: corrected power output... sorry for the extra zero LOL (reduced size to 7x7) - Advanced drill: now is prioritized over regular drill - Several recipes now use corresponding skills for production - New Items: - TEG: super efficient way of cooling rooms.. but lacks the ability for set temps - Powered wall: just a wall, with a power outlet - Advanced security door: security door from DLC but stronger and faster open/close rates - Glowing Column - satisfies Royalty Titles and I'm working on getting the Ideologies to accept it as well - Advanced Turret - name is self explanatory, let me know if I should increase or decrease its damage - Ultra Skin Gland - increases beauty and provides armor - OCD Katana - :) - Odyssey's Unique Weapons: - OCD Katana (done) - MPG-5 (in progress) - OCD Guns (TBD) - EMRG-1 (TBD)
- New research: - two new researches which, once completed, decrease the power consumption of core game items (lights/auto doors) - see patch folder in game files to see how to set for other mods
** Introducing Nanites - they don't really do anything yet but they are in the mod and will be used in future recipes.
** Removed the Cargo Shuttle as I can't get the dumb thing to look right when you rotate it
Any questions or bugs, let me know about them in the comments or on GitHub.
